# This shows how to use the -C flag to run muxt in a different directory

muxt -C subdir generate

exists subdir/template_routes.go

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- subdir/template.go --
package subdir

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- subdir/template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}Hello from subdir{{end}}
-- subdir/go.mod --
module example.com/subdir

go 1.24
